reviews.review: Впервые прошёл игру году в 2007-2008, точно уже не помню. Что сказать об игре? Шедевр! Однозначно шедевр. До сих пор таких интереснейших головоломок больше не встречал.
Habs nach weniger als 3 Stunden durchgespielt. Dennoch war Portal von Anfang bis Ende perfekt. 10/10

Amazing game

Portal me impressionou muito e além do esperado, eu tinha uma expectativa muito alta do jogo, e essa expectativa foi totalmente correspondida. Fui pego de surpresa com o enredo maravilhoso, eu esperava "apenas" os puzzles incríveis. A ausência da trilha sonora em boa parte do jogo se encaixa perfeitamente com as situações em que estamos, onde precisamos analisar e pensar em uma solução, aliado ao fato de reforçar a solidão que sentimos, já que de fato estamos sozinhos. Já nos créditos temos uma composição original espetacular, que diz muito sobre os personagens, na minha opinião é o melhor encerramento já feito nos games, seguido de perto por Gears of War 1 com o rap cantado por Cole Train.
10.10 would suck apertures dick again

Este es uno de esos juegos que no sabes apreciar de niño y creo que a todos nos pasaría, era imposible que los que somos ahora veinteañeros pudiesemos apreciar un buen juego de puzzles en su año de salida. En ese año, ya conociamos a Valve y acabaríamos amando el Counter, pero ahora me he dado cuenta de que esta es la verdadera joya de Valve. Hermoso y divertido.

Portal, no hablare de su historia ni nada porque seguro todos sabemos que trata sobre la busqueda interminable por un solo objeto, cual mueve la historia completamente y es la unica razon por la que sigues jugando, eso y luces magicas de colores cuales abren portales, pero eso no es importante ahora.

Los pasteles en este juego son un elemento narrativo cual motiva al protagonista de esta epica aventura a aventurarse por diversas pruebas para conseguir lo que quiere, llegando a tal punto de locura que termina destruyendo a su guia la cual amablemente la dirigia a traves de las pruebas y que le daba muchos mensajes de animo. 

Este juego es perfecto, tu recompenza el pastel que recibes al final del juego es suficiente para justificar las 3-4 horas de juego, por lo que he de darle un 9/10 pero como en el juego terminan matando a tu mejor amigo incinerandolo friamente le doy un gobierno de piñera/10

Ok,so i didnt knew this game existed until i bought The Orange Box for the PS3 2 years ago.So after i completed the Half Life 2 ,Episodes and got bored of PS3 TF2,i finnaly played Portal and.... I hate it and stop playing it for 3 weeks,until i tough twice and decided to play it again.I had a ton of fun,the felling of completing a puzzle is amazing,and the Plot Twist in the end was really well done and the level design is pretty good (because its an puzzle game),but,like great games there are flaws and this game is no exception,the game is pretty boring ,its just you (Main Character) and an Robot solving puzzles,even tough i had fun completing it,the best part was when ( SPOILER ALERT) youre trying to escape and it is fun hearing GLados trying to stop you.So i this said i will give this game 7/10,still good but the sequel is better.

断断续续玩着终于通关了！直到16关为止我还觉得是个解谜益智游戏（……）
但之后的展开和气氛渲染真的很棒！16-19关感觉节奏加快了完全停不下来！一口气刷完了！

先赞美一波ED真好听！GLaDOS真的很可爱！

作为一个完全零了解买下游戏的玩家，剧情说实话，零了解开始玩这款游戏直到通关也只拼拼凑凑的猜出了一点剧情真相，只能从一些图片和墙上涂鸦，机器人说的话里找到点儿事实的影子。（其实直到最后我还是没懂结局什么意思，待会去查查介绍）

之所以后面几关给人紧张的气氛，我想是一部分原因是画面的反差。[spoiler] 前期的地图都是白色为主，十分干净的实验室风格，但后期加入了一些实验室外的隐藏房间，那些红褐色沾满铁锈的老厂房，对比已经足够强烈，暗示也足够明显了。从这里开始我才感觉到事情不妙，背后水深。[/spoiler]

机器人们的声音也非常直观的体现出了无感情的机械感，虽然它们说的话真的挺有趣的……[spoiler]特别是boss战的那个黄球，天真可爱得不忍心把它丢进焚化炉。还有会扫射的小机器人，报废之后说的那句话是''I don't hate you''吗？挺扎心的。[/spoiler]

然后吐槽一波，对我这种手残来说这根本不是解密游戏！！跳19关那个高台愣是跳了十几分钟上不去，气到昏厥（。）今天抱着肯定凉凉的心态一试居然就跳上去了！！
解密不难，最爽的地方是推翻那个小机器人看着它胡乱扫射然后报废，或者从背后接近再把它举起来，听着它说''放我下来！''然后笑眯眯的丢出去感觉超级爽哈哈哈哈哈（←神经病
所以19关超多小机器人的空间那里是我打的最开心的（……

总之如果对解密和科幻感，黑色幽默都有点兴趣的朋友可以尝试入这款！！打发时间（划掉）猜测剧情还是很有价值的！

虽然直播的时候弹幕都喊晕，但是自己玩的时候实际觉得还好……总之如果有晕3D的朋友还是慎入吧！

[h1]I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.  It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.[/h1]

Portal is an incredible puzzle game with a whole lot going for it.  From it's tight controls and intuitive gameplay, to it's incredible world design there's a lot to love.  The graphics look very clean, most of the levels look fairly simple and consist of white walls and screens leaving most of the emphasis on the puzzles.
The puzzles manage to strike a great balance between challenging and rewarding, although some take a fair amount of time (and yelling).

Bonus points for Portals incredible writing, genuinely funny antagonist GLaDOS, and the absolutely fantastic [i]Still Alive[/i] ending credits theme.

게임러라면 누구나 아는 명작 포탈 마침 90퍼센트 세일하길래  하프 라이프 이후 밸브의 띵작 두 번째 입문용 으로 바로 질러버렸다.플레이타임은 4시간 정도로 길지는 않은 편.하지만 스토리 이해도 쉬울 뿐 더러 퍼즐을 푸는 내내 집중력이 흐트러지지 않았다.1050원에 샀지만 원가로 사도 전혀 아깝지 않을 게임 다만, 멀미가 날 수 있고 최종보스가 너무 쉽다는 게 유감.
this game is really amazing but I like the second part the best!

Keep in mind that I don't play a lot of video games besides simple puzzle games like Tetris. I played with my keyboard, but looking up/down can't be binded to keys so gameplay was a bit awkward (had to use the mouse to look up/down). This game took me a long time to finish (Steam says 55 hours, but I'm sure it's closer to 25 or 30). The first part of the game (levels 1–17) was fun, bright, and attractive. 

Then the test chambers got ugly and I got stuck for months trying to figure out level 18. The "levels" just got uglier and more depressing after that; gameplay became tedious. The robot's stupid jokes started getting on my nerves. I never really found them funny, just a bit distracting. 

I'm glad it's over. I like solving problems, not duckwalking through grim basements and sewers and seeing blood/being shot at/being poisoned. If you just want to solve puzzles, be prepared for when gameplay becomes more like a typical video game.

Plusy:
- zabawa portalami
- łamigłówki i wyzwania
- dialogi
- dużo znajdziek
- przedmioty są fizyczne, można je podnosić czy przenosić przez portale 
- wieżyczki :D

Minusy:
- można ją przejść w godzinę(nie liczyć wyzwań)
- grafika, mimo że nie jest brzydka, to odstaje

Podsumowanie:
To absolutny klasyk, w który trzeba zagrać.
 T R Z E B A.
